Computer: DNA replicated. Data accessed.

Tyrael plucked a feather from his neck and inserted it in the porthole
of the terminal. He downloaded all the engine crystal's data in his
own head.

Tyrael:That will be the safest place.

As the information entered him, he smiled. It was just as he had
hoped. With that, he could boost the potential and performance of the
nanites forming a techno-organic transformer.

Tyrael: Computer, store the genetically altered nanites in a secure
lockbox. Set password to my spark signature.

The computer complied. Tyrael wondered briefly what Blackheart would
say, but he didn't care. He was a Tripredacus, not a mischievious
Predacon. He was loyal to his general, and so would be his creation.
